DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study , involve 1-day 8-day dosing period , design test safety investigational study drug ARRY-371797 healthy subject . Approximately 48 healthy subject US enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study ARRY-371797 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Key Healthy male female age 18 60 year . Females must nonchildbearing potential . Body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) < 113 kg ( 250 lb ) . Additional criterion exist . Key A positive test drug alcohol . Use prescription nonprescription drug , herbal dietary supplement , vitamin , grapefruit juice within 14 day prior first dose study drug . Additional criterion exist .
